content:
Can you provide a brief overview of the new online course in an HTML page format? Please include the following details:
- Course title
- Course description
- Course objectives
- Course structure (modules, topics, assignments)

Certainly! Below is a simple HTML page format for the new online course, incorporating the details you've requested. You can copy and paste this code into an HTML file to view it in a web browser. ```html New Online Course Overview

Course Title: Introduction to Web Development

Course Description

This course provides a comprehensive introduction to web development. It covers the fundamental concepts and technologies needed to build modern, responsive websites. Students will learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more through hands-on projects and assignments.

Course Objectives

  • Understand the structure and functionality of web pages.
  • Learn how to use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create interactive websites.
  • Develop responsive designs that work on various devices.
  • Gain the skills to continue learning and exploring advanced web technologies.

Course Structure

Modules

  • Module 1: Introduction to the Web
  • Module 2: HTML Basics
  • Module 3: Styling with CSS
  • Module 4: JavaScript Essentials
  • Module 5: Building Responsive Websites

Topics

  • Understanding Web Architecture
  • HTML Tags and Structure
  • CSS Selectors and Properties
  • JavaScript Syntax and Logic
  • Responsive Design Techniques

Assignments

  • Assignment 1: Create a Simple Web Page Using HTML
  • Assignment 2: Style a Web Page with CSS
  • Assignment 3: Develop Interactive Features with JavaScript
  • Assignment 4: Design a Responsive Web Layout
``` This HTML format provides a basic layout for presenting the course details, including the title, description, objectives, and structure. Feel free to modify the content to fit the specific details of your course.
